item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://updrafts.app - WYSIWYG web site builder for tailwindcss based designs. Free for non-commercial usage.

item.title: Adds Checkly to monitoring category
item.description: https://checklyhq.com - Open source E2E / Synthetic monitoring and deep API monitoring for developers. Free plan with 5 users and 50k+ check runs.

item.title: Removed alibaba, because it's "free trial" is false advertisement
Netlify Description Ambiguity Corrected
item.description: https://www.netlify.com/ - Builds, deploy and hosts static site/app free for, 100 GB data and 100 GB/month bandwidth.

item.title: Add Plasmic
item.description: https://www.plasmic.app/ - A fast, easy to use, powerful web design tool and page builder that integrates into your codebase. Build responsive pages or complex components; optionally extend with code; and publish to production sites and apps.

item.title: Add Hostman.com
item.description: https://hostman.com - Deploy up to 3 static sites from your GitHub repository for free.

item.title: Added TinyMCE
item.description: https://www.tiny.cloud - rich text editing API. Core features free for unlimited usage.

item.title: add webhook.site
item.description:
https://efemarai.com - Testing and debugging platform for ML models and data. Visualize any computational graph. Free 30 debugging sessions per month for developers.
https://newsapi.org - — Search news on the web with code, get JSON results. Developers get 3,000 queries free each month.
https://applitools.com/) — Smart visual validation for web, native mobile and desktop apps. Integrates with almost all automation solutions (like Selenium and Karma) and remote runners (Sauce Labs, Browser Stack - Smart visual validation for web, native mobile and desktop apps. Integrates with almost all automation solutions (like Selenium and Karma) and remote runners (Sauce Labs, Browser Stack). free for open source. A free tier for a single user with limited checkpoints per week.
https://webhook.site - Verify webhooks, outbound HTTP requests, or emails with a custom URL. Temporary URL and email address is always free.
